name: MIDI Karaoke
description:
Turn any MIDI file song into a karaoke game. Your singing pitch is measured and scored by its accuracy. Save a video recording of your performance.

Features Include:
- Learn to sing on pitch with visual feedback
- Record with vocal effects (reverb, distortion, etc)
- Transpose songs to fit your vocal range
- Training mode to learn songs
- Optional front-facing camera recording embedded in video
- Two player mode (requires 2 microphones)
